entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
